post.summary: SummaryList returns a subset of application summaries found in the user cluster.

environment_qualified_name.description:
EnvironmentQualifiedName (EnvQN) contains both the account name and the environment name as
<account_name>/<env_name>.

application_name.title: ApplicationName with the name of the application

include_yaml_conversion.description: IncludeYAMLConversion determines if the raw YAML representation is also included.

include_json_conversion.description: IncludeJSONConversion determines if the raw JSON representation is also included.

playground_appsAppInfoRequest.title: AppInfoRequest with the information required to ask for an application

playground_appsAppStatus.description:
AppStatus defines the status of an application.

 - APP_UNKNOWN: Unknown with an undeterminate status
 - APP_OK: AppOk signals that are elements of a given application are running.
We need OK status to be compatible with OAM2
 - APP_WARNING: AppWarning signals that some of the elements of an application are not running.
 - APP_RUNNING: AppRunning signals that are elements of a given application are running.
 - APP_TERMINATED: Appterminated when an application without deployments neither statefulsets, only workflow and/or jobs terminated
 - APP_SUSPENDED: AppSuspended when the workflow is suspended waiting for a manual relaunch
 - APP_SCHEDULED: AppSheduled when an application with cronJobs are waiting to execute the jobs
 - APP_ERROR: AppError signals that the application is on an error state.

visual_id.description: VisualId contains a hash unique to the instance for representation purposes.

status.description: Status with the name of the overall status of the application.

component_status_name.description: ComponentStatusName with the string representation of the component status.

playground_appsAppSummary.description: AppSummary with a summary of an application.

from.description: From indicates the index of the first entry returned.

to.description: To indicates the index of the second entry returned.

playground_appsAppSummaryListResponse.description: AppSummaryListResponse with a subset of applications.

visual_id.description: VisualId contains a hash unique to the instance for representation purposes.

status.description: Status with the name of the overall status of the application.

component_status.description: ComponentStatus with a map of the associated component status.

status_name.description: StatusName with the string representation of the status enum.

component_status_name.description: ComponentStatusName with the string representation of the component status.

component_ingresses.description: ComponentIngresses with a map associating component name with the list of associated ingresses.

error_messages.title: ErrorMessages with all the error messages in case of application status is error

instance_yaml.description: InstanceYAML with the YAML representation of the referenced instance.

instance_json.description: InstanceJSON with the JSON representation of the referenced instance.

playground_appsComponentStatus.description:
ComponentStatus defines the status of a component associated with an application configuration.

 - UNKNOWN: Unknown with an undeterminate status
 - OK: OK signals that all the replicas of the component are running. Notice that the number of replicas may be
specified in a trait.
 - WARNING: WARNING signals that some of the replicas of the component are running but some remain. This could mean that either
the replicas are being launched, or an error prevents the creation of the required replicas.
 - RUNNING: RUNNING signals that all the replicas of the component are running. Notice that the number of replicas may be
specified in a trait.
 - TERMINATED: TERMINATED All the task in a job are terminated
 - SCHEDULED: SCHEDULED a cronJob component is waiting to execute the jobs
 - ERROR: ERROR signals that there has been an error on a component.

application_data.description:
ApplicationData with the compressed application descriptors. The data must
be compressed as tgz.

target_environment_qualified_name.description:
TargetEnvironmentQualifiedName specifying the target environment in the user
account as account_name/env_name.

playground_appsDeployApplicationRequest.description:
DeployApplicationRequest with the information required to send a
deploy request.

url.description: URL where the application is accessible.

playground_appsIngressInfo.description: IngressInfo with the relevant information about an ingress.

parent_component_name.description: ParentComponentName with the name of the component the ingress is attached to.

ingresses.description: Ingresses with the list of ingresses.

playground_appsIngressList.description: IngressList with a list of ingresses.

target_environment_qualified_name.description:
TargetEnvironmentQualifiedName specifying the target environment in the user
account as account_name/env_name.

playground_appsRemoveApplicationRequest.description: RemoveApplicationRequest to remove an application instance.

target_environment_qualified_name.description:
TargetEnvironmentQualifiedName specifying the target environment in the user
account as account_name/env_name.

playground_appsResumeApplicationRequest.description: ResumeApplicationRequest to resume a worklow application.

status_name.description: StatusName with the string representation of the status.

user_info.description: UserInfo with additional information to show to the user.

playground_commonOpResponse.description:
OpResponse with a common definition for the result of executing an operation through gRPC. Notice that
in case of an error, the call must fail unless the operation is executed asynchronously and this
message contains the result of a past operation.

playground_commonOpStatus.description:
OpStatus enumeration defining the possible status of an operation.

 - UNKNOWN: Unknown operation status indicates an error in the processing of the request as all operations should
have a determined status.
 - SUCCESS: Success indicates that the operation was completed successfully.

environment_qualified_name.description:
EnvironmentQualifiedName (EnvQN) contains both the account name and the environment name as
<account_name>/<env_name>.

playground_environmentsEnvironmentSelect.title:
EnvironmentSelector with information to determine the target environment. The current selected
environment as specified in the JWT will be used otherwise.
Keep in mind that we can select an environment through EnvironmentQualifiedName or
through the combination of AccountId and EnvironmentId, being incompatible the use of the two selectors at
the same time

playground_oam3Application.description: Application entity describing the components that form an application.

type.description: Type of the component associated with the ComponentDefinition.

properties.description: Properties of the component. This field sets the values to the parameters exposed from the component schematic.

inputs.description: Inputs that are used in the component.

scopes.description: Scopes being applied to the component in the form of scope-type:scope-instance-name.

images.title: Images used by the component definition

playground_oam3ApplicationComponent.description: ApplicationComponent describes how to instantiate a component that is part of an application.

name.title: Name with the name of the application component

healthy.title: Healty with a bool to indicate if the application component is healthy or not

message.title: Message with information about health status of App component

traits.title: Traits with the traits health status

playground_oam3ApplicationComponentStatu.description: ApplicationComponentStatus defines the status of a component.

playground_oam3ApplicationPolicy.description: ApplicationPolicy defines a global policy for the all components in the application.

policies.description:
Policies defines global characteristics for all components in the application. The evaluation of policies occurrs
after the components are rendered, and before the workflow steps are triggered.

workflow.description:
Workflow associated with the application. If present, the workflow defines a series of steps that are executed in order
with the AppRevision as source. Notice that the runtime does not applies resources if a workflow is present, as this is
delegated to the workflow processing stage.

playground_oam3ApplicationSpec.description: ApplicationSpec with the specification of the application including components, policies and workflows.

services.description: Services record the status of the application components.

playground_oam3ApplicationStatus.description: ApplicationStatus with the overall application status including components, traits, and workflow.

playground_oam3ApplicationTrait.description: ApplicationTrait with the properties of a traits that is being applied to a component.

healthy.title: Healthy with a bool to indicate if the trait is healthy or no

message.title: Message with information about health status of trait

playground_oam3ApplicationTraitStatus.description: ApplicationTraitStatus defines the status of a trait linked to a component.

steps.title: steps with an array of steps

playground_oam3ApplicationWorkflow.description: ApplicationWorkflow defines a workflow that is executed at an application level.

type.description:
Type of this condition. At most one of each condition type may apply to
a resource at any point in time.

last_transition_time.description:
LastTransitionTime is the last time this condition transitioned from one
status to another.
It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

reason.description: Reason for this condition's last transition from one status to another.

message.description:
Message containing details about this condition's last transition from
one status to another, if any.

playground_oam3Condition.description: Condition in which a resource can be.

parameter_key.description: ParameterKey poiting to where the value will be applied.

from.description: From indicating the source of the value.

playground_oam3InputItem.description: InputItem defines values that are taken from other components or workflow steps and can be used as parameters.

uid.title: UID is the unique in time and space value for this object. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/identifiers#uids

creation_timestamp.description:
CreationTimestamp with the server time when the object was created.
It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

playground_oam3Metadata.description: Metadata associated with a kubernetes entity.

value_from.description: ValueFrom indicates the source of the value.

name.description: Name of the value for future referencing.

playground_oam3OutputItem.description: OutputItem defines values that are exposed by this component or workflow step.

mode.title: Mode with the mode of the workflw (DAG od StepByStep)

message.title: Message with information about health status of workflow

suspend.title: Suspend to indicate if the workflow is suspend

terminated.title: Terminated to indicate if the workflow is terminated

finished.description: Finished indicates that the workflow was completely executed with success.

steps.title: steps wit information about the steps in the workflow

start_time.title: StartTime with the time when the workflow started

playground_oam3WorkflowStatus.title: WorkflowStatus defines the overall status of an application workflow

inputs.description: Inputs that are used in the workflow step.

outputs.description: Outputs produced by the workflow step.

playground_oam3WorkflowStep.description: WorkflowStep defining a stage in the workflow process.

phase.title: Phase with the phase of the workflowstep (succeeded, failed, stopped or running)

message.title: Message with information about health status of the workflow step

reason.description: Reason with a  brief CamelCase message indicating details about why the workflowStep is in this state.

first_execute_time.description: FirstExecuteTime is the first time this step execution.

last_execute_time.description: LastExecuteTime is the last time this step execution.

playground_oam3WorkflowStepStatus.description: WorkflowStepStatus defines the status of a single step in an application workflow.

component_name.description: ComponentName specifies a component whose latest revision will be bind with ApplicationConfiguration. When the spec of the referenced component changes, ApplicationConfiguration will automatically migrate all trait affect from the prior revision to the new one. This is mutually exclusive with RevisionName.

parameter_values.description: ParameterValues specify values for the the specified component's parameters. Any parameter required by the component must be specified.

component_summary.title: ComponentSummary with the summary of the components

scopes.description: Scopes in which the specified component should exist.

playground_oamApplicationComponent.description: ApplicationComponent defines a component associated with an application configuration.

api_version.description: ApiVersion of the given application configuration.

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the application configuration.

playground_oamApplicationConfiguration.description: ApplicationConfiguration entity describing the components that form an application.

playground_oamApplicationConfigurationSp.description: ApplicationConfigurationSpec with the specification of the application configuration.

scope_ref.description: ScopeRef must refer to an OAM scope resource.

playground_oamApplicationScope.description: ApplicationScope specifies a scope in which a component should exist.

api_version.description: ApiVersion of the given scope. This field is mandatory.

kind.description: Kind of the scope. This field is mandatory.

name.description: Name of the scope. This field is mandatory.

uid.description: Uid of the scope. This field is optional.

playground_oamApplicationScopeReference.description: ApplicationScopeReference to reference a given scope.

name.description: The name of trait definition. This is used to reference to the definition/schema of the Trait. For one type of trait, there could be only one config/deploy in one component.

properties.description: Properties that can be configured and are exposed by this trait.

trait.description: Trait with the full specification of trait that should be passed to the runtime. This field is mutually exclusive with name and properties. [Legacy].

playground_oamApplicationTrait.description: ApplicationTrait specifies a trait that should be applied to a component.

images.title: images with the images of all associated containers

playground_oamComponentSummary.description: ComponentSummary defines a summary of the component.

uid.title: UID is the unique in time and space value for this object. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/identifiers#uids

creation_timestamp.description:
CreationTimestamp with the server time when the object was created.
It is represented in RFC3339 form and is in UTC.

playground_oamMetadata.description: Metadata associated with a kubernetes entity.

protobufNullValue.description:
`NullValue` is a singleton enumeration to represent the null value for the
`Value` type union.

 The JSON representation for `NullValue` is JSON `null`.

 - NULL_VALUE: Null value.
